summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 40th Street; from 48th Avenue Northeast to 50th Avenue Northeast, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8505 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
